channel.title: Webwork on Corner case
channel.description: Recent content in Webwork on Corner case

item.title: Custom WebWork Result Type
item.description: add following to a xwork.xml config file: use this custom type in the action: foo.jspActually can simply extend a webwork predefined resulttype for some purpose and override the conditionalParse and return a final location for the action. major methods in WebWorkSupport.java /** * Implementation of the execute method from the Result interface. This will call * the abstract method {@link #doExecute(String, ActionInvocation)} after optionally evaluating the * location as an OGNL evaluation.
